sections.MISSION: Medical Platoon executes Squad Field Training Exercise from 27-30 SEP 22 at PA 157 in the Grafenwoehr Training Area IOT validate Squads’ ability to conduct PLT Role 1 medical operations, evacuation, and individual skills training.
sections.INTENT: – : Lifeline sections are trained and evaluated on their specific functions within the platoon to increase the SQDNs RTD time and decrease killed in action rate.
sections.KEY TASKS:
–
Establish a Battalion Aid Station
Provide Ground Ambulance Evacuation Support Evaluate a Casualty (Tactical Combat Casualty Care)
sections.END STATE:
All Lifeline Medics and sections are trained and certified on their medical and tactical skills, their equipment, and knowledge of SQDN and GTA EVAC SOPs.
3.
sections.TASKS:
to Troops:
-A TRP, B TRP, C TRP:
Provide all 68Ws for training and certification from 28-30 SEP
Provide MEVs with crew on 29 SEP for training
-HHT
Provide resupply
5.

ALL EMERGENCIES NEED TO GO THROUGH RANGE OPERATIONS
POI to HLZ or AXP (Time 10-20 min)
MEV will pick casualty up from POI and bring PAX to the HLZ/ drive to the AXP in case of inclement weather(no air)
HLZ/AXP to Role II (Time 10-20 min)
HH-60s or HN EMS will transport casualties to Amberg, Sulzback or Weiden. -Total time 40 minutes from POI to Role III (CONFIRMED)
